p: Finally, the magnetic properties are critical for the passage of IONPs across the endothelial monolayer. Static magnetic fields can facilitate the entry of IONPs into the brain side and the proper delivery of their drug cargo. In addition, alternating magnetic fields can increment BBB permeability by magnetic heating [ 6]. In this regard, Kaushik et al. produced NPs of CoFe 3O 4 for non-invasive magnetically-guided delivery across BBB in mice. The uniform distribution was evaluated using in situ TEM and SEM in ultrathin sections of mouse brain, showing minimal agglomeration [ 77]. This study provides evidence for the great potentiality of the coordinated use of magnetic forces for nondestructive BBB crossing and the site-specific delivery of therapeutics to treat CNS diseases, such as Alzheimerâ€™s and brain tumors.
